channel.title: Moparscpe forum moderators
channel.description:
Hello I just wanna say something about the constant fighting and swearing that goes around in alot of posts on here.
Not trying to be bossy just wanna give a suggestion
My idea is to be a bit more strict with the people that go around insulting others on forums for no certain reason. I can see them doing this if there just joking around but ive seen some fairly harsh stuff.
Remember this is just a suggestion.
Candree

item.title: Moparscpe forum moderators
item.dc:creator: @sp4rkz sp4rkz
item.description:
@sp4rkz wrote:

Well if this Topic Doesn’t Get locked You will be cussed at, So i suggest Getting a moderator To lock.

It’s good that you are trying to point that out, But moparscape Is fill of noobs that dont know jack-shit, Only 19% Have a brain…

And with: 1573564 Posts in 142467 Topics by 241454 Members

The moderators are doing a Good-Job, and dont need To change one bit.

Read full topic
